name: Code Ninjas Core Program - CREATE Track
description: Year-round coding program for ages 7-14. Progress through color-coded belt system while building games. Learn JavaScript, Lua, C#, and game design. Drop-in format with personalized learning.

name: Code Ninjas JR - Ages 5-7
description: Introduction to coding for younger kids ages 5-7. Visual block-based coding with age-appropriate projects. Foundation skills in logic, problem-solving, and computational thinking.

name: Code Ninjas Core Program - White Belt Level
description: Beginner level coding using visual programming. Learn fundamental coding concepts through game creation. Scratch and block-based coding introduction.

name: Code Ninjas Core Program - Yellow/Orange Belt
description: Intermediate coding with JavaScript and Lua. Create more complex games with advanced mechanics. Learn functions, loops, and variables through game development.

name: Code Ninjas Core Program - Black Belt Level
description: Advanced coding mastery with original game development. Create fully functional games from scratch. Portfolio-ready projects and mentorship opportunities.

name: Code Ninjas Summer Camp - Game Building
description: Week-long summer camp focused on game design and development. Build complete games using various programming languages. Full-day immersive coding experience.

name: Code Ninjas Summer Camp - Roblox
description: Learn to create Roblox games with Lua programming. Design game worlds, code gameplay mechanics, and publish to Roblox platform. Week-long intensive camp.
stem_fields: Computer Science, Game Design, Lua Programming

name: Code Ninjas Summer Camp - Minecraft
description: Code in Minecraft using JavaScript. Create mods, custom game modes, and automated builds. Combine gaming with programming education.

name: Code Ninjas Summer Camp - Robotics
description: Build and program robots using VEX or LEGO platforms. Learn mechanical engineering, sensors, and automation. Hands-on robotics challenges.

name: Code Ninjas Camps - School Break Sessions
description: Winter break, spring break, and holiday coding camps. Themed coding projects during school vacations. Multi-day intensive learning experiences.

name: Code Ninjas Parents Night Out
description: Evening coding events while parents enjoy night out. Fun coding projects and games in supervised environment. 2-3 hour sessions.

name: Code Ninjas Birthday Parties
description: Coding-themed birthday parties for kids. Custom game building, robotics, or themed coding activities. Instructor-led party with all materials included.

name: Code Ninjas BUILD Program - App Development
description: Advanced program for teens learning mobile app development. Build iOS and Android apps. Professional development skills and portfolio creation.

name: Code Ninjas Web Development Track
description: Learn HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build websites. Full-stack web development fundamentals. Create responsive websites and web applications.

name: Code Ninjas Unity Game Development
description: Create professional 2D and 3D games using Unity game engine. Learn C# programming, physics, animations, and game publishing. Industry-standard tools.
stem_fields: Computer Science, Game Development, C# Programming

name: Code Ninjas Impact Programs - Community Outreach
description: Scholarship opportunities and community coding events. Free workshops for underserved communities. STEM education access initiatives.

name: Code Ninjas School Partnerships
description: In-school coding programs and after-school clubs. Bring Code Ninjas curriculum to schools. Teacher training and student coding education.

name: Code Ninjas Weekly Drop-In Sessions
description: Flexible drop-in coding sessions. No long-term commitment required. Pay-as-you-go model for families wanting flexible schedules.

name: Code Ninjas FREE Trial Session
description: Free introductory coding session for new students. Experience Code Ninjas curriculum and teaching style. No commitment required.
